# VectorizedBarPlotContent

**Structure**

An opaque vectorized chart content type.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct VectorizedBarPlotContent<Data> where Data : RandomAccessCollection
```

## Overview

Don’t use this type directly. Swift Charts automatically instantiates and consumes values of this type.

## Supporting types

- **body**: The content and behavior of the chart content.

## Conforms To

- ChartContent
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- VectorizedChartContent
